deck: Deck of Worlds Creative Expansion - Adventure Prompts (Heroes' Quests & Fools' Errands)

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Reusable quest hooks with customizable story elements

cards.title: VET EMERGENCY
cards.summary: A local pet needs urgent care at a distant vet. The owner will reward anyone who can get them there quickly.

cards.title: GOING DOWN SWINGING
cards.summary: A dread mage is dying and wants help taking down their mentor â€” to atone for the damage they have done.

cards.title: EXHIBIT BOO
cards.summary: The local historical society believes one of their items is haunted. They need help persuading the spirit to move on.

cards.title: DYING BREED
cards.summary: An artist needs guides to bring them to see the last member of an endangered species for a portrait.
cues: WHERE WAS THE ANIMAL LAST SEEN?

cards.title: DEAD LETTERS
cards.summary: A local's pen pal has gone silent and they suspect outside interference. They need someone to check on them.

cards.title: SLEEPING WITH THE FISHES
cards.summary: An excitable aquarist needs help tracking down a rare companion for their aquarium.

cards.title: WHO LEFT THE DOOR OPEN?
cards.summary: A researcher has opened a portal they cannot close. They need help to venture in and close it from the other side.

cards.title: POSSESSION AND THE LAW
cards.summary: A spirit claims their upcoming exorcism counts as wrongful eviction. They need help defending themselves in court.
cues: WHO OR WHAT IS THE SPIRIT HAUNTING?

cards.title: THE SONGBIRD
cards.summary: A composer needs to capture a live specimen of a bird with a unique song. They claim it is for inspiration.

cards.title: LATE FEES
cards.summary: A librarian needs help tracking down an unreturnable book that was stolen and swapped with a decoy.
cues: WHAT IS THE SUSPECT'S TRUE MOTIVE?

cards.title: LOST IN TRANSLATION
cards.summary: An ambassador is locked in tense negotiations but their translator has been delayed or abducted. They need help finding them.
cues: WHO DELAYED THE TRANSLATOR AND WHY?

cards.title: FIELD TEST
cards.summary: An inventor needs help testing a dangerous prototype in the field. They are offering danger pay.
cues: WHY DID THE INVENTOR CREATE THE PROTOTYPE?

cards.title: MISSING EVIDENCE
cards.summary: A grieving local needs help locating missing evidence in the case of a murdered loved one. The trial is already underway.
cues: WHO HAS (OR WHERE IS) THE EVIDENCE?

cards.title: MAPPING THE PAST
cards.summary: A researcher is offering a big reward for help mapping the ruins of a nearby area. They say not to believe the stories.

cards.title: AUCTION HERO
cards.summary: An stolen item is up for auction and the owner needs it back by any means necessary.

cards.title: EARWORM
cards.summary: Everyone has the same strange song stuck in their heads and they want to know why.

cards.title: TROUBLE BREWING
cards.summary: A recluse needs a rare herb for a special blend of tea. They seem desperate to have it as soon as possible.

cards.title: PRISONER TRANSFER
cards.summary: A high-profile prisoner needs to be escorted to a new facility. There has been a tip-off that someone plans to abduct them en route.

cards.title: SPELLING PROBLEM
cards.summary: A well-reputed mage needs help sourcing a spell component of their missing.
cues: WHY DOES THE MAGE NEED THE COMPONENT?

cards.title: BOTTOMS UP
cards.summary: A god of wine and chaos is holding a drinking contest. The prize is their most treasured possession.

cards.title: UNDER THE TABLE
cards.summary: A chef needs an ingredient to perfect a recipe. Unfortunately, the ingredient is illegal and hard to source.

cards.title: RELIC RESCUE
cards.summary: An activist plans to recover a misappropriated artifact from a local museum. They need help with a heist or negotiation.

cards.title: TRUTH TO POWER
cards.summary: A protester plans to give a speech against a powerful person and needs to hire protection.
cues: WHO IS THE PROTESTER SPEAKING AGAINST?

cards.title: THE COLDEST CASE
cards.summary: An amateur historian thinks they solved a centuries-old murder. They just need help digging up the body.

cards.title: MISSING CHILD
cards.summary: A child has gone missing. They were last seen searching a nearby area, but no one knows why.
cues: WHO IS LOOKING FOR THE CHILD?

cards.title: RIDDLE MASTER
cards.summary: A mysterious vagabond is offering a reward to whoever can answer their riddle.

cards.title: GARDEN VARIETY PEST
cards.summary: Pests are destroying a garden and beloved flowers and they need help saving their garden.
cues: WHAT COULD REPEL OR REMOVE THE PESTS?

cards.title: SURVEILLANCE
cards.summary: A local merchant suspects their business partner of dirty dealings. They want them tailed until they have evidence.

cards.title: ARTIFACT CHECK
cards.summary: A biographer needs someone to mark a detailed sketch or description of a historical figure's private possession.

cards.title: HATE MAIL
cards.summary: A local has been receiving anonymous threatening letters. They need help investigating the source.

cards.title: AMONG US
cards.summary: A local claims that someone has been replaced with a shape-shifter or impostor. They need help determining who.

cards.title: DO NO HARM
cards.summary: A spy in the local healers' guild is leaking private patient information. The guild leader needs the leak plugged quickly and quietly.

cards.title: A CROOKED GAME
cards.summary: A local was scammed into betting their home on a rigged game of chance. They need help winning it back or exposing the scam.

cards.title: FORMER GLORY
cards.summary: A disgraced hero needs help with a task that could help restore their reputation.

cards.title: ONLY SLEEPING
cards.summary: A necromancer is gathering a band of heroes to resurrect a benevolent god who died long ago.

cards.title: UP IN FLAMES
cards.summary: A custodian believes that a rogue pyromancer is preparing an attack on their building.
cues: WHAT MAGIC FOCUS DOES THE PYROMANCER USE?

cards.title: THE DEUCE
cards.summary: An inventor needs help recovering a stolen device of incredible power. They worry what it could do in the wrong hands.

cards.title: LOVE AND WAR
cards.summary: A heartbroken general wants to rescue their lover from behind enemy lines.

cards.title: LOOSE CANON
cards.summary: A trickster god was set free from prison and needs to be recaptured.
cues: WHERE IS THE GOD HIDING OR GOING?

cards.title: GROUND ZERO
cards.summary: A scholar needs help retrieving an artifact. They believe it could explain the origins of a cataclysm.

cards.title: EXILE EXPRESS
cards.summary: An exile needs an urgent letter delivered to someone in their homeland.

cards.title: CRASH LANDING
cards.summary: Something fell from the sky and crashed nearby. Locals claim it sits undamaged in the middle of the impact crater.

cards.title: GRAVE MISDEEDS
cards.summary: A gravedigger needs help catching someone who has been defacing graves.

cards.title: GET OUT OF TOWN
cards.summary: A reformed crime boss needs help reaching them. A safe house outside the area. Someone wants them dead, but they are not sure who or why.
cues: WHO WANTS THE CRIME BOSS DEAD AND WHY?

cards.title: A DANGEROUS GAME
cards.summary: A local trapper has accidentally caught and needs help releasing it safely.

cards.title: SEANCE FRICTION
cards.summary: A medium is planning to hold a dangerous public seance and a family member needs help sabotaging it.

cards.title: SHARED DREAMS
cards.summary: Everyone is having dreams about the same mysterious figure. An occultist needs help investigating the phenomenon.

cards.title: THE LAST STAND
cards.summary: Industrial activity is threatening the last grove or an endangered tree or plant. A conservationist needs help saving the area.

cards.title: GRIEF RUNS DEEP
cards.summary: A grieving parent is building a memorial for their late child. They need help gathering supplies and donations.
cues: WHAT FORM WILL THE MEMORIAL TAKE?

cards.title: WITNESS PROTECTION
cards.summary: A witness is due to give testimony. The court is hiring muscle to keep them safe in a hidden location.

cards.title: NOT FROM AROUND HERE
cards.summary: Visitors from another realm have appeared in the area. A local leader needs a task force to investigate and discern their intentions.

cards.title: NOT WITH A TEN-FOOT POLE
cards.summary: A cursed object has appeared in the middle of town and no one will touch it. They need someone to remove the curse or object.
cues: WHAT HAPPENS IF SOMEONE TOUCHES THE OBJECT?

cards.title: ANYTHING FOR LOVE
cards.summary: A loving couple wants parental blessing to marry. They need help completing a task to persuade a disapproving parent.

cards.title: SEEING STARS
cards.summary: An astronomer needs help getting to a remote or restricted area to observe a one-in-a-lifetime celestial phenomenon.

cards.title: EXPEDITED EXPEDITION
cards.summary: An explorer plans to set a new record for quickly completing a challenging route. They are assembling an expedition.

cards.title: TRAIL TO TRIAL
cards.summary: A legendary outlaw leader has been captured. Local law enforcement needs to escort them to trial before their gang closes in.
cues: WHO ELSE IS LOOKING FOR THE OUTLAW AND WHY?

cards.title: LOOSE LIPS
cards.summary: A ruler needs to know who has been sharing their secrets and spreading gossip in their court.

cards.title: ARTIFACTS OF WAR
cards.summary: An ancient bomb has been discovered in or under an important cultural site. The local leader needs it defused immediately.

cards.title: WHERE THE BLOW LANDS
cards.summary: A local guardian is preparing for an attack from a cult leader. They need help learning where the cult plans to strike.
cues: WHAT ARE THREE POTENTIAL TARGETS FOR THE ATTACK?

cards.title: BROKER OR BREAK-IN
cards.summary: A collector needs a one-of-a-kind item, but their rival will not trade with them. They need help brokering a deal or planning a break-in.

usage.description: A 60-card expansion featuring reusable quest hooks with customizable story elements. Each Adventure card has a title, summary, and 3 cues (story elements) that integrate with Story Engine Deck icons for creating personalized quests.
integration: Flashcards - Draw adventure cards for quest inspiration during worldbuilding or gameplay
Quest Menu - Lay out multiple adventure cards and let players choose which quest to pursue
Location-Based Quests - Place adventure cards on microsettings to create location-specific quests
Story Engine Integration - Use Agent, Anchor, and Engine cards to customize the adventure cues
